prajathanthrawadaya kiyanne hudu dhanapathi panthiye thani nishpadanayak nowe.eeka kamkaru panthiya ha dhanapathi panthiya athara thibena gatume ha sabandathawe prathipalayak.karmika diyunuwath samanga panthi sanwidhana diyunu wenawa wagema thakshana danumin piri kamkaru panthiyak bihiwenawa.owun ge adhyapana,saukhya wardhanaya wenawa.methula gowi,dhiwara,sisu,tharuna piris awadhi wenawa.me lesa nagitina wiwidha janatha balawega wiwidha anapanath magin wyawastha ramuwakin idiriyata geniyanawa. 1970 ganan weddi loka dhanapathi arbudhaya thula kensiyanu subhasadhanawadi dhanapathi aarthika salasum arbudhayata giya.meka loka parimana arbudhayak.ee arbudhayen goda enna dhanapathi kramaya mulyawadi aarthika prathipaththi kriyawata damimata patan gaththa.pasu kalinawa nawa libaralwadi kiyana lassana wachanayen handinwuwe meyayi.mehi mulika prathipaththiya thamayi kamkaruwan ge murtha watup ha aadayam kapala adhi surakamata dhanapathiyanta ida wiwrutha kirima.dewanna thamayi soba dahama surakama wada thiwrura kirima.thunwanna thamayi itha thiyunu lesa adu diyunu ratawala athirikthaya naya poli mangin karmika ratawalata ura ganimata katayuthu salasima.me thula kamkaru panthiye satan pamanak noweyi piditha jathika wimukthi aragalayan ge wishala wyapthiyak lowa purama athiwuna.ee anuwa mema satan mardanaya kirimata awashya naithika thathwayan sakas kirimata piyawara gaththa.lankawe me widiyata baluwama 1972 di wishala aahara hingayakata ape rate janathawa muhuna dunna.sathiye dina dekak aapanashalawala bath wikinima thahanam wuna.kamkaruwan ge watup kapim athulu wruththiya samithi mardana kriyakarithwayanta erehiwa eda pawathi sirimawoge rajayata erehiwa kamkaruwan maha wada warjanayak kala.
